title: Bug 122105the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when use the stored procedure.
description: Bug 122105the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when use the stored procedure.
OB: In the window "Edit data set", drag a store procedure to the QueryTextExpected Results:The stored procedure naming should be composed of the database schema name and the store procedure name
EB: Description:the schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when use the stored procedure.Steps to reproduce:1. create a new report2.
SR: create a data source and a data set on the store procedure3.
